text: Justice Syed Usman Ali Shah was a former governor of the Khyber-Pakhtunkhwa province of Pakistan. He remained the Chief Justice of Peshawar High Court from 19 December 1981 to 7 December 1987. He was also the Federal Ombudsman of Pakistan from 28 March 1991 to 27 March 1995. He died on 25 June 2020 at his residence in University Town, Peshawar.Khyber-Pakhtunkhwa ==References== Category:Living people Category:Governors of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Category:Chief Justices of the Peshawar High Court Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Syed Usman Ali Shah
